name: Wicked Virus
description:
This game  was created as entry for Trijam #40 A 3 hour game jam.

After you login to your account, you find out that there is Wicked Virus in your computer and it tries to crash your PC with random data. New files emerge and there is not enught space on disk. You can try keep deleting files but every other action is blocked by the virus. Good luck.
